channel.title: Adding a crown for owner
channel.description:
my plaerrights 2 and playerrights 3 use the same crown client sided. how can i change this?
i just want the player rights 2 be one crown and 3 be another, i know where to add the picture icon just not what to code in client sided

item.title: Adding a crown for owner
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

Go to: Class42.java

Search for: if (i_12_ == 2 || i_12_ == 3)

You will see something like that:

if (i_12_ == 2 || i_12_ == 3)
			Class23_Sub4_Sub3.method376
			    ("<img=1>" + arg2.method363(true, true),
			     "<img=1>" + arg2.method361(false, (byte) -44),
			     -23645, i_17_, string, 0, null, i_16_);

All you’ve to do is remove this “i_12_ == 2” from the code above
And add something like that:

if (i_12_ == 2)
			Class23_Sub4_Sub3.method376
			    ("<img=1>" + arg2.method363(true, true),
			     "<img=1>" + arg2.method361(false, (byte) -44),
			     -23645, i_17_, string, 0, null, i_16_);

You’ve to change the icon this one: “<img=1>” and “<img=1>”

Read full topic
